results.name: Index of first occurrence of exactly n consecutive threes in a row in the decimal expansion of Pi.
comment: Differs from A050282 as soon as a(4) > a(5), while A050282(4) = A050282(5) = a(5). - _M. F. Hasler_, Apr 13 2019
link: Peter Trüb, 22.4 trillion digits of pi
results.author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jul 07 2004
